de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher

Interface Tab.Callback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter, PhoneTabRecyclerAdapter, TabletContentRecyclerAdapterWrapper, TabletTabRecyclerAdapter, TabletTabSwitcherLayout
    Enclosing class:
    Tab

    public static interface Tab.Callback
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified, when a incoTab's properties have been changed, must implement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBackgroundColorChanged(Tab incoTab)
      The method, which is invoked, when the incoTab's background color has been changed.
      void onCloseableChanged(Tab incoTab)
      The method, which is invoked, when it has been changed, whether the incoTab is closeable, or not.
      void onCloseButtonIconChanged(Tab incoTab)
      The method, which is invoked, when the icon of the incoTab's close button has been changed.
      void onContentBackgroundColorChanged(Tab incoTab)
      The method, which is invoked, when the background color of the incoTab's content has been changed.
      void onIconChanged(Tab incoTab)
      The method, which is invoked, when the incoTab's icon has been changed.
      void onProgressBarColorChanged(Tab incoTab)
      The method, which is invoked, when the color of the incoTab's progress bar has been changed.
      void onProgressBarVisibilityChanged(Tab incoTab)
      The method, which is invoked, when the visibility of the incoTab's progress bar has been changed.
      void onTitleChanged(Tab incoTab)
      The method, which is invoked, when the incoTab's title has been changed.
      void onTitleTextColorChanged(Tab incoTab)
      The method, which is invoked, when the text color of the incoTab's title has been changed.
